headline: SOLITEC AUTOMATIC TWO-STATION PHOTORESIST COAT & BAKE
description:
Automatic Two-station 
Photoresist Coat & Bake     Designed to coat and soft 
bake semiconductor wafers.
specstable:
Manufacturer Solitec
Model 820-CB
Wafer Size Range
Minimum 50 mm
Maximum 150 mm
Set Size 100 mm
Number of Tracks 1
Number of Hot Plates 1
Controller Type Analog Controller Type
Accessories Solitec 8600 Calibration Module
Other Information System Features and Specifications
  • Resist Uniformity: 75 angstroms, 3 sigma
  • Microprocessor Controlled (10 program capacity)
  • Fast Hot Plate Bake: +/- 1.5ºC uniformity
  • Speed Range: 200-8,000 rpm (solid state servo control)
  • Acceleration Range: programmable from 0-40 krpm/s
  • Hot Plate: up to 300ºC vacuum assisted enclosed bake
  • Beltless Elevators
  • Nitrogen Requirement: 1 connection, 1/4" OD, 60 psi
  • Vacuum Requirement: up to 4 connections, 1/4" OD
    • Year of Manufacture 1988
    Condition Like New
    Operating Air Pressure 60.00 PSI (413,718.00 N/sq m)
    Vacuum Required 25.00 in Hg (634.99 mm Hg)
    Exterior Dimensions
    Width 59.000 in (149.9 cm)
    Depth 15.500 in (39.4 cm)
    Height 37.000 in (94.0 cm)
